short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simulate how people with colour blindness see the world.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension simulates different types of colour blindness (Deuteranopia, Protanopia, and Tritanopia) on any webpage, allowing users to experience how colourblind individuals perceive the content.
